net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Class DefaultErrorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.DefaultErrorListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorListener, ScanListener, ViolationReporter

    public class DefaultErrorListener
extends Object
implements ErrorListener
    Default implementation which reports all exceptions as violations.
